descriptionHtml:
-- Basic Details --

Mod Name: Realistic Weight and Value
Mod Author: Ninjakreborn (Joyel Puryear - http://www.joyelpuryear.com)
Business Site: http://www.infotechnologist.biz

-- Mod Specifics --

Description: This mod simply redoes the weight/value of several items in the game to make them more
realistic, and in some cases more manageable.

Specific Changes: The overall goal of this mod is to modify the weight/value of everything, as well

as taking posted feedback into account, to achieve the most realistic weight and value amounts for

each item, without being annoying to the user as well. It's hard to come up with a full list of

things that were modified, so the list below tries to cover the basics, but may not be entirely

accurate.

- Modified many basic items (Plates, forks, bowls, pots, pans, and so forth).
- Modified several of the annoying items (burnt books and so forth).
- Modified pricing on some of the more rare/exotic items. A good example is Werewolf hide. It

should be worth more because it's so hard to find, among other items.
- Modified soul gem values/weights. This may not be entirely... realistic yet. I just did a first

draft of revisions. In a future release I will carefully redo weight/value of all of the gems, so

feedback is appreciated.
- Adjusted the sizing of the Ysgramore's blade fragments slightly to what a fragment would weigh

realistically.
- Other random weight/value changes and adjustments.

Conflicts: There should be none.

Install: Just install it like any other mod. Add the esp into data folder, and turn it on. I

recommend Nexus Mod Manager for it.

Update: Just disable the old app, uninstall it, then install the new app. Recommended to use the

Nexus Mod Manager to uninstall the old one, and install the new one.

Feedback: This is my first Skyrim mod. I definitely need feedback on it on how to improve it, and

change requests.

-- Release History --

Version 1.3

- Adjusted weight and value of horse hide, wolf pelt, werewolf pelt, goat hide, Sabrecat Pelt, Sabrecat Snot Pelt, Deer hides and

pelts.
- Adjusted values on the pots.
- Adjusted weight and value for human troll skull.
- Adjusted weight and value of the burned book.
- Adjust value of dragon scales/bones.


Version 1.0

- Initial release version.
